author: Geoff Dembicki, Harry Cheadle
title: Coronavirus Could Be a 'Trigger Moment' That Reshapes Society for the Better
description: The Sanders campaign could use this opportunity to transform into a pandemic-fighting, world-changing social movement.
content: On Sunday night, Bernie Sanders hosted a virtual town hall about the coronavirus crisis that is threatening millions of lives and obliterating the economy. Instead of bailing out the airlines, casinos, shale oil companies and other industries that are demandi… [+7533 chars]
